body.p:
Hopkinsville Ky May 20th/ 61
Hon Beriah Magoffin
Commander in Chief
Ky Militia-
Dr Sir
I return herewith my commission as Major of the enrolled Militia of Christian County.
The office was not sought by me- nor do I feel competent to discharge its duties & therefore deem to resign.

I have the honor to be Yr Obdt Svt
Ben H. Bristow
In consequence of the fact that Mr. Bristow has stated to me that he can not serve as Major. with much regret I ask that his resignation may be accepted.

Respectfully.
W. D. Gentry
Col. Enrold Militia Christ. Co Regiment.
Christian Co
Resignation of the Major of Enrolled Militia
June 21. 1861
